description: The Vibe 12" Light Clip On Light is the perfect wireless light to use for reading! The light globe of this reading light serves a dual purpose; one half provides you with lighting and the other half of the globe is a speaker for your MP3 player. Clip this light onto your reading material and use the port for your music This lamp has a metallic, modern style Perfect for taking on trips Assembly level/degree of difficulty: No Assembly Required.
title: Vibe Clip-on Speaker with Fold Out Light (Battery or Plug in Powered) Black
